goanna-central.xrefDesc:
This contains the latest development code (git master/trunk branches) for
Pale Moon, Basilisk, Borealis, Interlink and the Goanna Runtime Environment

binoc-build.xrefDesc: Experimental build system based on Mozilla's. Also includes associated BinOC Projects

uxp-4.8.3.xrefDesc:
This contains a snapshot of the code for the last released version
of the Unified XUL Platform (RELBASE_20210823)

palemoon-rel27.xrefDesc: This contains a snapshot of the code for the last released version of Pale Moon 27.x
